fulltext:
NGUYEN THI TUYET NHUNG 
PERSIONAL INFORMATION: 
Full Name: Nguyen Thi Tuyet Nhung 
Gender: Female 
Nationality: Vietnamese 
Job Title: Senior Testing Engineer  
SUMMARY: 
A senior tester with more than 10 years experiences in software testing industry with 7 years working 
as team leader in many IT projects from America, Japan, and Australia. 
Extremely good at team leading with master organization, risk estimation, problem solving, 
negotiation skills, test strategy, making team process & working with clients. 
Experience in building up a new testing team. 
Experienced in both manual and automation testing with great knowledge of software testing process. 
Able to work with various kinds of environments: Windows, Linux, Android, Mobile and devices 
testing; plus excellent in bug finding ability. 
Enthusiastic, mind of responsibility for work, multi-tasking, flexibility and very strong work-ethic. 
Having many experience in requirement analyzing, design test plan, test case, execution test and bug 
finding, and very familiar with defect tracking tool: Quality Center; Jira and good product analysis 
skills. 
Fluently in English, hard-working, fast-learning abilities are strongest points. 
Friendly, open-minded and determined in completing tasks even under high pressure 
Expertise includes: 
• 
Database: SQL, MySQL 
• 
Programming languages: C++ /  VB6.0 / 
Java / .NET  
• 
Automation test tools: Quick Test Pro, 
Win Runner, etc. 
• 
Have knowledge and familiar with: 
Linux, Networking, Windows 
• 
Develop test cases 
• 
Software testing strategies/knowledge. 
Testing types: sanity, smoke, regression, 
functional, 
system, 
load/stress 
test/performance  testing,  black  box 
• 
Telecom skills: SIP, VXML, CCXML 
testing, etc 
LANGUAGES: 
• 
Fluently in English and Vietnamese. 
EDUCATION: 
2018 
Professional Scrum Master I 
2017 
ISTQB Agile Tester 
2016 
ISTQB Certified Tester Foundation Level. 
2003– 2007: 
University of Natural Sciences 
BS, Computer of Science  
Page 1 of 5 
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE: 
Testing Projects: 
Apr  2018 – Now 
TestLead/Manager – GCS company 
Testing Services:  
Finemax – Web testing 
The project is Banking Domain Testing. 
The testing activity focuses on UI displaying, security testing, DB testing. 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Manage team and control testing progress. 
• 
Clarify task and requirement.  
• 
Making team process, test strategy, templates. . 
• 
Report test result to customer. 
• 
Using Bosina tool to create automation test cases. 
• 
Preparing test data.   
Achievements: 
• 
Improve management skills such as planning, risk, time, 
negotiation, reporting.  
Jan  2018 – Mar 2018 
Test Lead/Manager – GCS company 
Testing Services:  
GTC web testing 
The project is testing a web site which manage working time, productivity 
of staffs.   
The testing activity focuses on UI displaying, security testing, point of staff 
at daily/monthly/yearly.  
Responsibilities: 
• 
Manage team and control testing progress. 
• 
Clarify task and requirement.  
• 
Making team process, test strategy, templates.  
• 
Review test cases. 
• 
Report test result to customer. 
• 
Organize non-work activity. 
Achievements: 
Improve management skills such as planning, risk, time, negotiation, 
reporting. 
Page 2 of 5 
Jan  2012 – Dec 2017 
Tester /Test lead – GCS company 
Testing Services:  
Multimedia appliance device testing 
The project is testing an embedded device which is a multimedia 
appliance one, enabling a television set to become a user interface to the 
Internet and also enabling a television set to receive, decode digital 
television broadcasts. 
The testing activity focuses on UI displaying, video/audio, graphic 
rendering, recording/playback and interacting between the device and 
external A/V receiver. 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Manage sub team and control testing progress. 
• 
Clarify task and requirement.  
• 
Execute test cases and evaluate test result. 
• 
Review test cases improvement. 
• 
Look for functional and user-oriented bugs 
• 
Report test result to customer. 
Achievements: 
• 
Improve management skills such as planning, risk, time, 
negotiation, reporting.  
• 
Improve test execution and bug finding skill 
Jun 2011 – Dec 2011 
Tester /Test lead – TMA company 
Testing Services: Mobile 
Soft Phone on Mobile Phone 
This project aims to design a soft phone using SIP technology on Mobile 
Phone. 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Manage testing project. 
• 
Work with Developer team to clarify what the customer’s 
requirements and write down SRS file.  
• 
Work with customer to clarify what the customer’s requirements 
are. 
• 
Review test plan, test cases 
• 
Analyze status of project and report its status to customer weekly 
or daily. 
• 
Assign task to test members. 
Achievements: 
• 
Improving management skill 
Page 3 of 5 
Mar 2010 – May 2011 
Tester /Test lead/ Support Customer – TMA company 
At this period of time I played a role of leader, support PM interviewed new 
members and built a new testing team.  
Testing Services: Mobile 
Mobile application testing 
 Test and assess quality of mobile products in Smart phones, platforms 
and server side. 
Responsibilities: 
 Interview new members 
 Support PM to build up team's process. 
 Build a new support team. (Answer questions of users about our 
products  ) 
 Training new members 
 Writing SRS document, test cases. 
 Review issue’s another 
 Report daily to customer 
• 
Testing on Smart phone client/ Web server. 
Achievements: 
• 
Improved Human resources management skill 
• 
Improved Issue solving skill 
• 
Improved knowledge about Android, iPhone, … 
• 
Improved communicate with customer via mail/ phone 
Feb 2008 – Jan 2010 
Tester / Test Lead – TMA Company 
Testing Services: 
Media Application Server (MAS) 
The MAS is a generic media processing Platform. The MAS platform is a 
stand-alone component that interfaces to both the control-planes and 
bearer-planes of the network. The control-plane uses SIP for signaling, 
while the bearer-plane uses both the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) 
and the Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) for media 
Responsibilities: 
 Write automation test scripts 
 Perform testing duties 
 Break down test cases 
 Write test procedures 
 Lab operations, maintenance and preparation for test 
 Report bugs 
 Follow up issues 
 Assign task to another member 
 Support test member to analyze their issues. 
Page 4 of 5 
Achievements: 
• 
Got experiences in telecom system, especially for communicate 
with customer. 
• 
Understanding stress testing, performance testing. 
• 
Have knowledge Linux. 
• 
Have knowledge Quality Center system. 
• 
Using many network tools: JMeter, WinSCP, Wireshark, Putty, … 
• 
Learning to write test plan, test case. 
• 
Improved Issue solving skill 
• 
Improved management skill 
• 
Improved Requirement analyst skill. 
Page 5 of 5
